Module app.supernaut.fx
Package app.supernaut.fx

Interface FxForegroundApp.FxMainView

All Superinterfaces:
ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView, ForegroundApp.SupernautView
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFxMainView
Enclosing interface:
FxForegroundApp
public static interface FxForegroundApp.FxMainView extends ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView
A OpenJFX-compatible ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView that potentially contains a Stage. We are trying to make having a Stage optional, because in test environments (and perhaps macOS apps if someday OpenJFX gets better macOS support) the Stage may not be present.
